title: StockHedges
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Trump tariffs and export curbs on China cast a cloud over major chip stocks
items.description: Chip companies from AMD to Super Micro said U.S. tariff policy and export restrictions to China have caused uncertainty for their businesses.

items.title: Novo Nordisk shares jump 5% as drugmaker sees copycat Wegovy sales easing in 2025
items.description: Novo Nordisk on Wednesday reported a better-than-expected rise in net profit but lowered its full-year sales growth forecast.

items.title: Here's what to expect when Disney reports earnings before the bell
items.description: Disney will report its fiscal second-quarter earnings before the bell on Wednesday.

items.title: AMD beats on earnings but will take $1.5 billion hit to revenue from chip restrictions to China
items.description: AMD reported first fiscal-quarter earnings on Tuesday that topped expectations, and provided a strong guide for current-quarter revenue.

items.title: Super Micro issues weak guidance, cites 'economic uncertainty and tariff impacts'
items.description: A week after issuing disappointing preliminary results, Super Micro said in its earnings release that it could see an impact from President Trump's ta...
